name: What can be exploited - should be exploited
description: If you have no knowledge of smart contracts you could go to better-call.dev and buy as many NFTs as you want by putting your number into `objkt_amount` field. Even though there is seemingly 1 item being sold in that specific `swap_id`. The price should be of that `swap_id` multiplied by `objkt_amount`. And the rest of tokens is taken from the contract, robbing currently opened secondary market positions. That is the heart of the exploit and it could simply be done by Temple Wallet without ever leaving your browser.
